StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Genetic contributions of lupus nephritis in a multi-ethnic cohort of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The data used for the analyses described in this paper were obtained from the database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP), at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap. Genotype and Phenotype data for the Genetic contributions of lupus nephritis in a multi-ethnic cohort of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) were provided by Lindsey Criswell, University of California San Francisco (UCSF). Data are from the Lupus Genetics Project at the University of California San Francisco (UCSF), with funding from the National Institute of Health (NIH) P60 AR-053308, R01 AR-44804, UL1-TR-00004, and the Alliance for Lupus Research. Collaborators that provided samples include Dr. Betty Tsao (University of California Los Angeles) with funding support from NIH R01 AR043814, Dr. Marta Riquelme-Alarcon (University of Granada, Spain) with funding support from the Swedish Association against Rheumatism and the Gustaf den Ve:80th year Foundation to MEAR and Dr. Eric Morand (Monash University, Australia).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autoimmune Diseases)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autoimmune Diseases.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Systemic lupus erythematosus, IRB, PUB, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SLE-IRB-PUB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Systemic lupus erythematosus. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Systemic lupus erythematosus, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SLE-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Systemic lupus erythematosus. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Systemic lupus erythematosus, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SLE-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Systemic lupus erythematosus. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
Aggregate level data only. Individual level data will be provided pending certification from University of Granada.
